# epilot-taxonomy_taxonomy_classification (Data Source)

TaxonomyClassification DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "epilot-taxonomy_taxonomy_classification" "my_taxonomyclassification" {
  classification_slug = "purpose:<name>"
}
```
